title: First Day
content: Today was special because I saw Damia smile again.

title: Rainy Afternoon
content: It rained after class. Somehow it felt peaceful, just like her vibe.

title: Study Time
content: We all studied together for the test. I noticed her focus â€” it's inspiring.

title: Quiet Moment
content: She didn't talk much today, but her silence felt calm. Sometimes words aren't needed.
